title: Characteristics of Birth 1, England and Wales
summary: Presents statistics on birth registrations in England and Wales by birth characteristics. This package contains summary statistics on stillbirths including figures by age of parents and quarter of occurrence. Tables also provide birthweight data for live and stillbirths by mother's area of usual residence and maternities, live births, and stillbirths in hospitals by area of occurrence.
metaDescription: Presents statistics on birth registrations in England and Wales by birth characteristics.
